title: 419: Bekah’s Engaged and Surprises Jess!
itunes:title: 419: Bekah’s Engaged and Surprises Jess!
description:
The news is out…Bekah is engaged! But when The Broads recorded this Bekah had not announced her and Grayston’s engagement yet so she surprised Jess in studio! Tune in for the emotions, the story of how Grayston proposed, upcoming wedding plans and ideas, and Bekah shares some engagement horror stories!

***Be sure to join The Broads Thursday as they hop back into recapping this season of The Bachelorette(s)!
